name: All-Star Baseball 2001
description:
First ever Hall of Fame™ team including Nolan Ryan and Reggie Jackson.

Over 700 Major League Baseball® players and 30 stadiums including 5 new ballparks.

All-new Batting Practice mode lets you hone your skills.

Faster gameplay with Easy Batting / Pitching options.

Hook slides, swipe tags, and home plate collisions.

Fist-pumping player celebrations!

• Full roster management includes: multi-player trades; create, sign and release players.
• Team stats in over 300 categories by STATS Inc.
• The Yankees' John Sterling and Michael Kay call the action.
• Over 100 authentic batting stances and home run swings.
